Uses of Interface
com.unitedcaterers.UCServer

  • Packages that use UCServer 
    Package Description
    com.unitedcaterers  
    com.unitedcaterers.client  
    com.unitedcaterers.server  
    com.unitedcaterers.serverwithoutlockcookie  

    • Uses of UCServer in com.unitedcaterers

      Methods in com.unitedcaterers that return UCServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UCServer UCServerFactory.getClientProxy()
      Note that the return type here is UCServer and not ClientProxy (even though as you may have observed, RMIUCServerFactoryImpl actually creates ClientProxy object.

    • Uses of UCServer in com.unitedcaterers.client

      Classes in com.unitedcaterers.client that implement UCServer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SocketClientConnector
      This class is the client side counterpart of the socket based UCServer.

    • Uses of UCServer in com.unitedcaterers.server

      Classes in com.unitedcaterers.server that implement UCServer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RMIUCServerImpl
      Since we need to make this a RMI Remote object we have to extend it from UnicastRemoteObject and so we cannot extend it from UCServer.
      class  SocketUCServerImpl
      The purpose of this class is to accept client connections and broker the requests and responses.
      class  UCServerImpl
      This abstract class captures all the business methods required by the client.

    • Uses of UCServer in com.unitedcaterers.serverwithoutlockcookie

      Classes in com.unitedcaterers.serverwithoutlockcookie that implement UCServer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClientProxy
      This is a client proxy object that is instantiated on the server side for every client.
